Articles.Content:
Hi,Finally I've got my Rover to Minmus... But it faced a wierd scenario while trying cross the frontier lowlands/Midlands: there was an impassable gap in the surface (see image ).

How to solve it?

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7snssYo9VFpVGEyMk1hT2I4Zjg/view?usp=drivesdk
